course_subtitle: Free course from the community The Rolling Scopes.
course_description_1: The course is intended for RS School students who have passed RS School stage #2, as well as for new students who have knowledge and practical experience in using the following technologies and tools:
course_description_2: JavaScript, typescript, Git, GitHub (clone, add, commit, push, pull, merge, rebase, work with Pull Request), npm, webpack, CSS3 / HTML, Chrome DevTools Figma, Understanding the concept of REST API.
